attributes.action: Make a week 8 days long with 3 weekend days
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reasons for a 3 day weekend... 1) Britain will be in a better mood.
2)less people skiving work
3)more money spent as people use extra day off to do stuff - good for economy
4)people will be more relaxed, working for less of their lives and consequently live longer (not a guarantee obviously)
5)Go on... Do it!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
